email_subject: Blackline of First Amendment to Contract
email_body: <<3MMPRED.DOC>> Phillip, Enclosed please find a blackline of the First Amendment to Contract showing the revisions. I have forwarded a clean version of the Amendment to you for your signature. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact me at (512) 370-2836. Thanks. Michelle L. Simpkins Winstead Sechrest & Minick P.C. 100 Congress Avenue, Suite 800 Austin, Texas 78701 (512) 370-2836 (512) 370-2850 Fax msimpkins@winstead.com - 3MMPRED.DOC
